Pre-Game Insights: Phoenix Suns (3-1, second in the Western Conference) will face Portland Trail Blazers (2-3, 11th in the Western Conference) on Saturday, 10 p.m. EDT.
Others: The Suns finished 49-33 overall, 29-23 in Western Conference play and 24-16 at home during the 2023-24 season. The Trail Blazers went 21-61 overall and 8-44 in Western Conference action during the same season.
Injuries: Suns: Josh Okogie: day to day (hamstring), Bradley Beal: day to day (elbow). Trail Blazers: Matisse Thybulle: out (knee), Robert Williams III: out (hamstring), Shaedon Sharpe: out (shoulder).
